text: Boogie Brush
Five marshmallows left one for each of you.
I can’t eat anymore Bob.
They get stuck in my teeth.
I can eat Polly’s share.
You will turn sticky and sweet like a marshmallow, Jack.
You have eaten way too many.
Not if you brush your teeth before you sleep.
Yaaaawn! I am too sleepy
I ate only 2 my mouth is clean. See…aaaaaa
I like the taste of marshmallows on my lips.
Yeah, So will the ants, when you are asleep.
Bob, we so don’t want to brush our teeth.

If you don’t brush and wash
Germs will say, Öh my gosh!”

We have a new home
Where we can freely roam.
But Bob, I am too tired right now.
Oh that’s a shame.
I was hoping Mary will teach us a new dance tonight.
But I don’t know a new dance, Bob.
I have a new song.
I thought you would so love to make a dance out of it and teach us.
But never mind, you all are too sleepy.
No Bob, I am not all that sleepy.
I want to learn a new dance
I am also not all that tired, Bob.
Really? You sure?
Yes!
Ah! That’s good to hear.
Let me whisper the song to you Mary and see if you can come up with some steps.
I love your song, Bob.
Ooh! I am so excited. I think I have the steps ready.
Are you all ready to meet the Boogie Brush?
What’s that?
Let me show you. Bob…on the count of three….3,2,1!

We go to the left…1,2,3
We go to the right…dum dum dee

With the boogie brush in hand
Let’s dance as we stand.

A little on the inside..ha ha ha
A little on the outside…he he he

With the boogie brush in hand
Let’s dance as we stand.

Let’s get the tongue to roll…ah ah ah
Clean, clean is our goal…ah ah ah.

With the boogie brush in hand
Let’s dance as we stand.

Teeth so white, teeth so clean
They are the best that I have seen

The Boogie Brush is so awesome,
For scrubbing your teeth, tongue and gum.
Do you guys want to learn this?
Yay!
Ok
Then get your toothbrushes out…now!
Follow my lead…together.

We go to the left…1,2,3
We go to the right…dum dum dee

With the boogie brush in hand
Lets dance as we stand

A little on the inside..ha ha ha
A little on the outside…he he he

With the boogie brush in hand
Lets dance as we stand.

Lets get the tongue to roll…ah ah ah
Clean, clean, is our goal…ah ah ah.

With the boogie brush in hand
Lets dance as we stand.

Teeth so white, teeth so clean
They are the best that I have seen

The Boogie Brush is so awesome,
For scrubbing our teeth, tongue and gum.
Now isn’t it a fun way to brush and keep germs away?
So get your boogie brush out and remember to do
The boogie brushing every night and every morning.
Have a wonderful day filled with joy, laughter and learning!
See you soon.
